title: Understanding Prejudice
text: Prejudice involves preconceived opinions or feelings about a group that are not based on reason or actual experience.

title: Components of Prejudice
text: Consider the different aspects that make up prejudice, such as beliefs, thoughts, feelings, and attitudes.

hintAnswer: beliefs, thoughts, feelings, and attitudes someone holds about a group
title: Identifying Prejudice
text: What are the key elements that define prejudice?
choices: beliefs, thoughts, feelings, and attitudes someone holds about a group
